record.jsxtip: Fires after the user clicks this button or after an equivalent event.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event. May be null if this event is triggered by calling doExecute().

record.jsxtip: Fires after the user right-clicks this button and before the bound context menu displays. Canceling this event prevents the menu from displaying.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxreturntext: use this field to override the default menu with an instance of jsx3.gui.Menu.

record.jsxtip: Fires after this button loses focus.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires after this button gains focus.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires after this button is removed from the DOM.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the parent of this button before it is removed from the DOM.
